title.narrative: Incentive Support for Girls in Secondary Education - Ghana

description.narrative: This project is providing bursary support for 31,000 girls (8,000 in JHS, 12,000 in SHS) over four years in 30 districts. The project includes wrap around support covering: Planning for School Excellence using school data in 260 schools; engagement with the Ghanaian government’s Girls Education Unit; training Girls\' Education Officers and Teacher Mentors; district exchange visits for GES staff; and training for DECs participating in Planning for School Excellence.;
